title: fonts with under dots
content:
Hi all,

For those of you who typeset books in-house or spec interior designs for books with non-standard diacritics (outside of the open-type pro capabilities), can you recommend any text fonts that can support extended diacritics such as under dots?

I found that Adobe Garamond Premier Pro offers some under dot characters, but not for the letter “H,” which I would definitely need included.

Thank you!
author: wsup_design

comments.content:
To clarify, I’m looking for Latin characters with under dots for both vowels and consonants in fonts suitable for scholarly text.

Thanks!
